title: Faire Product Scraper
description: Fast API-based scraper for Faire.com. Extract wholesale products, brands, and pricing. Supports login cookies to unlock wholesale prices.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Faire category or search URL to scrape. Optional if Search Query is provided.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Product search term (e.g. 'candles'). Used if Start URL is empty.

resultsWanted.title: Maximum number of products
resultsWanted.description: Maximum number of products to collect.

cookies.title: Login Cookies (for Wholesale Prices)
cookies.description: Paste your authenticated session cookies here to unlock wholesale pricing. You can get these using a browser extension like 'EditThisCookie' or by inspecting network requests.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Residential proxies recommended for bypassing Cloudflare protection on Faire.
